name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior QA Engineer with 13+ years of experience in delivering high-performance applications, with a strong focus on compliance-driven development and robust testing strategies. Skilled in **Python**, **Django**, and **GitLab** with proven expertise in utilizing **Pytest** for thorough testing practices. Experienced in multi-platform environments, proficient in **Windows**, **Linux**, and **Unix** systems.
Strong background in database management and networking concepts, including **DNS**, **DHCP**, and virtualization technologies. Demonstrated ability to support cloud-native systems through continuous integration and delivery processes. Committed to building high-quality solutions that align with industry standards in the healthcare and finance sectors.
